sentences.en: God invites all people to partake of Holy Communion.
sentences.cn: 神邀请所有的人都来领受圣餐.

sentences.en: His very clothes seemed to partake of his hospitable nature.
sentences.cn: 他这身装束似乎显示了他的好客.

sentences.en: It would be a privilege to partake vicariously of their emotions.
sentences.cn: 以共鸣的方式分享他们的感情也是一种特殊的荣幸.

sentences.en: Miracles are not generally regarded as magical. Nevertheless, they do partake of the same nature.
sentences.cn: 奇迹一般不会被认为是魔法使然，不过二者在本质上有点相似。

sentences.en: None shall partake of the meal until the master has come.
sentences.cn: 在主人未到之前,决不会用餐.

sentences.en: They invited us to partake of their simple meal.
They seem to me to partake little of the character of demonstration.
sentences.cn: 依我看来,他的论点似乎很少有例证的性质.

sentences.en: They were happy to partake of our feast, but not to share our company.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢享用我们准备的丰盛大餐，但是不喜欢和我们呆在一起。

sentences.en: We do not only meet to share each other's burdens, but also to partake in each other's joys.
sentences.cn: 我们相聚不仅分担彼此的负担, 而且分享彼此的快乐.

sentences.en: We will partake in the celebration.
Will you partake of our breakfast with us?
sentences.cn: 和我们一道吃早饭好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will you partake of our simple meal?
sentences.cn: 你和我们一道吃点便饭好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Would you care to partake of some refreshment?
You will probably be asked about whether you partake in very vigorous sports.
sentences.cn: 你可能会被问到是否参加非常剧烈的体育运动。

words.tran_cn: 分享；参与；分担；带有某种性质

trans.tran_cn: 吃，喝；分享；参与；分担；带有某种性质
